msg: I am Aida. I work at Forward Thinking Energy. My primary directive is to press the button to cool the reactor’s temperature.
Salary system activated. How can I help you?
Forward Thinking Energy is a legitimate company with honorable goals. Company loyalty is valued at Forward Thinking Energy and will be rewarded.
